synopsis.text: Rouge, an amnesiac princess from the Underworld's dethroned royal family, finds herself in the unlikely company of Yusuke, an orphaned high school student, when she quite literally falls from the sky into his arms. As they navigate the complexities of Rouge's memory loss and Yusuke's disrupted life, they are joined by Rouge's younger sisters and pursued by their family's adversaries. Rouge grapples with the decision to regain her memory, while Yusuke faces the chaos that the princesses have brought into his world. Will Rouge confront the truth hidden in her forgotten past? Will Yusuke and Rouge's blossoming love survive the turmoil, or will they be torn apart by forces beyond their control?
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
